resources.string: "Connect to %1$s? Tap DETAILS to see information about this WLAN network."
"WLAN is turned off and Airplane mode is turned on. Please change these settings by tapping on SETTINGS."
"WLAN is turned off. Please turn on WLAN from SETTINGS."
This WLAN network has security risks
"You can quickly access the web or connect to WLAN by scanning a QR code. This function is active while in Photo mode. You can change this setting from QR Code reader in Camera settings."
"Cannot connect with any Sony's WLAN/NFC camera when your Xperia is connected with another Xperia."
This mode is unavailable during WLAN tethering.
"Only one Sony's WLAN/NFC camera can be connected with your Xperia at a time."
"Cannot connect with any Xperia when your Xperia is connected with a Sony's WLAN/NFC camera."
Cannot connect to this WLAN network
Tap to connect to WLAN network \"%1$s\"
